Hi,

The summary says all. To reproduce:

1. Open debug perspective.
2. Select menu / show view / other / Problems

Now the ide is locked. If you close, it will close normally and then reopen normally... without the Problems view.

I can't reproduce this on XP, although your OS is Win2K its unlikely but vaguely possible its OS dependent (XP and Win2K are pretty close).  Is this bug consistent?  Do you have other plugins or is this just a straight eclipse SDK install? I am highly surprised that this bug could exist.

Is there anything else you can add?

Hi,

I set a new workspace, and at the new one the problem doens't happens.

I can send you my current eclipse folder and also the problematic workspace. Do you want it?

thanks and regards

Glad that sorted it for you.  Lowering severity from critical to normal and assigning bug. Could you please hang onto workspace for two weeks in case bug assignee wants to look at it?  In the interim if the problem reoccurs in the new workspace please let us know and up severity again.
What would be more usefulk is a stack dump when this happens. I suspect another process is holding onto the workspace lock.
And how can i generate such stack dump? I'm calling eclipse.exe file
